attributes.action: No to Turkey joining the EU
attributes.additional_details:
Prevent BILLIONS of pounds worth of tax payers money going towards creating infrastructure in Turkey as would happen should they be granted EU membership.

Arguably Turkey is not even located in Europe.

Turkey borders IRAQ, IRAN and SYRIA.
Do you really want these countries as neighbours?

Turkey's borders being opened up to the rest of Europe with no restrictions would open the flood gates of illegal immigration from beyond Turkey's borders into Europe and Britain
